TTSC.SAPI5Settingshint: Configuration for using SAPI5 text-to-speech engine with Boyomi-chan
TTSC.BymChnDefaultVolumehint: Default value for individual vocalizer setting (min 0, max 300)
TTSC.BymChnPlayerSettinghint: Show individual readout settings for each vocalizer to player (require reload)

TTSC.WindowSAPI5Settingstitle: Configuration of SAPI5 sound source to be used
TTSC.WindowID: ID in Boyomi-chan's text-to-speech engine (10001 or higher)
TTSC.WindowCheckDeletecontent: Are you sure you want to delete the file? (The deletion is immediate and cannot be restored.)
TTSC.WindowNoNameNoIdcontent: There is an item with a blank name or ID. Are you sure you want to delete the item?
TTSC.WindowSelectSpeakerVoicetitle: Individual readout settings for each vocalizer
